definitions: in a way that strives to gain or win something by defeating others

examples.text: I began swimming competitively nearly 30 years ago
they were clamoring competitively for her attention

shortDefinitions: in way that strives to gain or win something by defeating others

definitions: in a way that compares favorably with others of the same nature, particularly in relation to price

examples.text: we will have to do some outsourcing to stay competitively priced

shortDefinitions: in way that compares favorably with others of the same nature
